kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Opens a new SSH connection to the given `host` and `port`.

kw.name: Login
kw.doc: Logs into the SSH server with the given `username` and `password`.

kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to
kw.msg: Connecting using : pymysql.connect(db=manifest_air_test, user=pattaraporn, passwd=pattaraporn@netbay, host=10.1.3.72, port=3306, charset=None)

kw.name: Put File From Local to Server
Put File
kw.doc: Uploads file(s) from the local machine to the remote machine.

kw.name: Check File in Server should visible
File Should Exist
kw.doc: Fails if the given `path` does NOT point to an existing file.

kw.name: Start Command
kw.doc: Starts execution of the `command` on the remote machine and returns immediately.

kw.name: Read Command Output
kw.doc: Returns outputs of the most recent started command.

kw.name: Get Substring
kw.doc: Returns a substring from ``start`` index to ``end`` index.

kw.name: Get Substring
kw.doc: Returns a substring from ``start`` index to ``end`` index.

kw.name: Execute Command
kw.doc: Executes `command` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.

kw.name: Execute Command
kw.doc: Executes `command` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.

kw.name: Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.

SELECT VH.VH_ID, VD.VD_ID FROM vsedhead VH LEFT JOIN vseddetail VD ON VH.VH_ID = VD.VD_HID WHERE (VH.VH_UserID <> '' AND VH.VH_UserID <> 'N/A' AND VH.VH_MessageFunction <> '' AND VD.VD_MessageFunction <> '') AND VH.VH_UserID = '31010006340000001' AND VH.VH_status = 'Pending' AND VD.VD_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY VH.VH_ID DESC SELECT VH.*, VD.* FROM vsedhead VH LEFT JOIN vseddetail VD ON VH.VH_ID = VD.VD_HID WHERE VH.VH_ID = '843674' AND VD.VD_ID = '62074' SELECT Company FROM tab_airline WHERE Code = 'TG' and Company='TG' and `port` is null SELECT Company FROM tab_airline WHERE Code = 'TG' and Company='TG' and port='THBKK' TG==TGfinish"

arguments.arg: SELECT vsedhead.VH_Status FROM vsedhead LEFT JOIN vseddetail on vsedhead.VH_ID = vseddetail.VD_HID WHERE vsedhead.VH_TransportMeansJourneyID = '${FlightNoToQuery}' AND vseddetail.VD_FlightDate = '${FlightDateToQuery}' AND vsedhead.VH_DocumentType = '${Indicator}'

kw.msg: Arguments: [ "SELECT vsedhead.VH_Status FROM vsedhead LEFT JOIN vseddetail on vsedhead.VH_ID = vseddetail.VD_HID WHERE vsedhead.VH_TransportMeansJourneyID = 'TG625' AND vseddetail.VD_FlightDate = '2017-06-07' AND vsedhead.VH_DocumentType = '23'" ]

Execute Command

kw.name: Execute Command

kw.msg:
Return: "
select VH_ID from vsedhead where VH_DocumentNumber = 'ACYNVV000I2Z4' and VH_status = 'Sent'
UPDATE vsedhead VH set VH.VH_RecvControlNo = '23600607400000001', VH.VH_LastUpdate = '2017-06-07T00:05:48',VH.VH_status = 'Accepted' where VH_ID='843664'
UPDATE vseddetail VD set VD.VD_status = 'Accepted' where VD_HID='843664'
select VH_ID from vsedhead where VH_DocumentNumber = 'ACYNVV000I2ZE' and VH_status = 'Sent'
UPDATE vsedhead VH set VH.VH_RecvControlNo = '23600607400000002', VH.VH_LastUpdate = '2017-06-07T00:05:48',VH.VH_status = 'Accepted' where VH_ID='843674'
UPDATE vseddetail VD set VD.VD_status = 'Accepted' where VD_HID='843674'
SELECT VH.VH_ID, VD.VD_ID
 FROM vsedhead VH LEFT JOIN vseddetail VD
 ON VH.VH_ID = VD.VD_HID
 WHERE (VH.VH_UserID <> ''
 AND VH.VH_UserID <> 'N/A'
 AND VH.VH_MessageFunction <> ''
 AND VD.VD_MessageFunction <> '')
 AND VH.VH_UserID = '31010006340000001'
 AND VH.VH_status = 'Pending'
 AND VD.VD_status = 'Pending'
 ORDER BY VH.VH_ID DESC
finish"
